name: Cube Master
description: Cube Master is a digital version of the Rubik's Cube puzzle game. The screen is split in two areas. Bottom half has a graphical presentation of the cube viewed from two different perspectives with all of its faces visible. The top half is used to enter text commands to interact with the cube. Each face has a letter and by entering it that face is turned 90 degrees clockwise while entering it with shift held down turns it 90 degrees anti-clockwise. To scramble the cube the player enters X followed by the number of moves to shuffle. It's also possible to have the computer solve the cube by typing S. There's also a feature for the player to draw his own cube by entering the colour wanted for each square.
